articles.author: Anish Anand
articles.title: Australia rip up Fulton's plans as India left chasing shadows in 1-5 defeat - ESPN India
articles.description: India had an afternoon to forget, as control and defence deserted Craig Fulton's side in their preparation for the Paris Olympics.
articles.content: Control and defence are the two things Craig Fulton craves the most from his hockey teams. On Saturday, against Australia, both these things went completely missing from India's gameplan as they open… [+3728 chars]
